br.div: Yesterday, Governor Cuomo ordered the public schools to stay closed until at least April 29. This was not unexpected. Also yesterday, the NYS Board of Regents canceled the June 2020 Regents exams. They issued guidance on the decision a short while ago. Our administrative team is reviewing the guidance. Please refer to the following links for additional information.
Wishing everyone health, wellness, and resiliency! Many blessings to those families in our community who are celebrating Passover and Holy Week/Easter.
